definition: to go out/to come out/to occur/to produce/to go beyond/to rise/to put forth/to happen/(used after a verb to indicate an outward direction or a positive result)/classifier for dramas, plays, operas etc
variant of 出[chu1] (classifier for plays or chapters of classical novels)

sentences.english: Same as Wan Shun 1 and Epistaxis (nose bleeding).
sentences.chinese: 鼻出血及同腕顺一穴主治。

sentences.english: Blow on the nose and nose picking may be the direct cause of bleeding.
sentences.chinese: 用力擤鼻子和用手指挖鼻孔可能是鼻出血的直接原因。

sentences.english: Epistaxis occurred in about 20% of patients in both treatment arms.
sentences.chinese: 两项试验中鼻出血的发生率几乎都是20%。

sentences.english: In horse, the careless or rough passage of a stomach tube may result in bleeding from the nose.
sentences.chinese: 对马不小心或粗暴插入胃管可导致鼻出血。

sentences.english: Methods Sum up the nursing experience of 32 Cases of aged and stubborn nosebleed.
sentences.chinese: 方法总结32例老年顽固性鼻出血的护理体会。

sentences.english: What good method does remedial nosebleed have?
sentences.chinese: 治疗鼻出血有什么好方法？

sentences.english: Objective To discuss different therapeutic methods of intractable epistaxis .
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨不同治疗方法对顽固性鼻出血的意义。

sentences.english: Objective: To study the endoscopic treatment of intractable epistaxis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨鼻内镜下难治性鼻出血的方法。

sentences.english: Aprimary extranasopharyngeal angiofibroma is area, A22-year-old man sought medical advice due to repeated nasal hemorrhage and stuffy nose.
sentences.chinese: 患者为22岁男性，因反复性大量鼻出血及鼻塞就诊。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the clinical treatment of the obstinate epistaxis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨顽固性鼻出血的治疗方法。

sentences.english: Many children a child will be epistaxis , in general, there would be no big problem.
sentences.chinese: 许多儿童会儿童鼻出血，一般不会有大问题。

sentences.english: The clinical data of 126 cases with epistaxis were retrospectively analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 对126例鼻出血患者的临床资料进行统计学分析。

sentences.english: Objective To study the diagnosis and treatment of anterior fossa fracture combined with nosebleed.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨前颅窝骨折并发鼻出血的诊断和治疗。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the effective nursing interventions for epistaxis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探寻治愈鼻出血有效的护理措施。

sentences.english: Conclusion The method of using endoscopic electrocoagulation to treat epistaxis is practicable.
sentences.chinese: 结论鼻内镜电凝法治疗难治性鼻出血的方法值得推荐。

pinyin: shang4 hu1 xi1 dao4 gan3 ran3

definition: stomatitis/ulceration of oral cavity/inflammation of the mucous lining of the mouth
to bleed from the nose/(fig.) to be sexually aroused
to bleed/bleeding/(fig.) to spend money in large amounts
